title: New: Sun Glitters – Things Are…
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/thingsareuse.jpg "thingsareuse")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7480-new-sun-glitters-things-are/attachment/thingsareuse) [**Sun Glitters**](http://sunglitters.bandcamp.com) has been on our horizons for a while now. His gentle blend of instrumental hip-hop, dream-pop and good old-fashioned beat music has stunned anyone who listens. His new single ‘_Things are…_’ is no exception; it churns the stomach with its snappy beat, while transporting you to a psychedelic dream world through the blemishes of voices and vocals. I was there, believe me when I say this; it was fucking rad. Check it out bellow. things are… by Sun Glitters
